mapper.select: /* iboard, iuser, regdt, 글쓴이 이름 정렬은 최신글이 가장 위로나오도록 */ SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.iuser, A.regdt, A.ctnt, B.unm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
